languages.text: {n}Следом за ними выходят несколько блюстителей и тут же вытягиваются по струнке — стоя плечом к плечу, они напоминают надежную стену из керамита. Их лидер рапортует:{/n} "Офицер Хротко, Ваша Светлость. Прибыл для оказания помощи и сопровождения!" {n}Он поворачивается в сторону локомотива.{/n} "Эй, Инфернус-мастер, мы нашли {mf|его|ее}!"

{n}Several enforcers emerge and immediately fall into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Следом за ними выходят несколько блюстителей и тут же вытягиваются по струнке — стоя плечом к плечу, они напоминают надежную стену из керамита. Их лидер рапортует:{/n} "Офицер Хротко, Ваша Светлость. Прибыл для оказания помощи и сопровождения!" {n}Он поворачивается в сторону локомотива.{/n} "Эй, Инфернус-мастер, мы нашли {mf|его|ее}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Several enforcers come out and immediately pull themselves into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Officer Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Arrived to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

languages.text: {n}Varios guardias salen del tren y forman filas de inmediato, hombro con hombro, como un muro sólido de ceramita. Su líder informa:{/n} «Capitán Hrotko, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Estamos aquí para proporcionar apoyo y escolta!». {n}Se gira hacia la locomotora.{/n} «¡Maestro de infernus, l{mf|e|a} hemos encontrado!».
languages.original_text: {n}Several enforcers emerge and immediately fall into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Varios guardias salen del tren y forman filas de inmediato, hombro con hombro, como un muro sólido de ceramita. Su líder informa:{/n} «Capitán Hrotko, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¡Estamos aquí para proporcionar apoyo y escolta!». {n}Se gira hacia la locomotora.{/n} «¡Maestro de infernus, l{mf|e|a} hemos encontrado!».

languages.text: {n}数名のエンフォーサーが姿を現し、すぐに整列して肩を並べ、まるでセラマイトの強固な壁のように立ちはだかる。リーダーが報告を開始した。{/n}「フロトコ中隊長です、陛下。支援と護衛のため参りました！」{n}男は機関車の方を向く。{/n}「おい、インフェルヌス・マスター、陛下を見つけたぞ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Several enforcers emerge and immediately fall into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}数名のエンフォーサーが姿を現し、すぐに整列して肩を並べ、まるでセラマイトの強固な壁のように立ちはだかる。リーダーが報告を開始した。{/n}「フロトコ中隊長です、陛下。支援と護衛のため参りました！」{n}男は機関車の方を向く。{/n}「おい、インフェルヌス・マスター、陛下を見つけたぞ！」

languages.text: {n}几位执法者跑了出来，所有人排成一列，肩并肩站在一起，仿佛一堵坚固的陶钢城墙。执法者的领袖向你报告。{/n}“我是赫洛卡上尉，大人。我们来提供支援，将您护送到安全的地方！”{n}他的目光转向了火车头。{/n}“嘿，控火大师！我们找到{mf|他|她}了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Several enforcers emerge and immediately fall into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}几位执法者跑了出来，所有人排成一列，肩并肩站在一起，仿佛一堵坚固的陶钢城墙。执法者的领袖向你报告。{/n}“我是赫洛卡上尉，大人。我们来提供支援，将您护送到安全的地方！”{n}他的目光转向了火车头。{/n}“嘿，控火大师！我们找到{mf|他|她}了！”

languages.text: {n}Mehrere Enforcers tauchen auf und fallen sofort in Reih und Glied, stehen Schulter an Schulter wie eine massive Wand aus Ceramit. Ihr Anführer berichtet:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir sind hier, um Unterstützung und Geleit zu bieten!" {n}Er wendet sich zu der Lokomotive um.{/n} "Hey, Infernus-Meister, wir haben {mf|ihn|sie} gefunden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Several enforcers emerge and immediately fall into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere Enforcers tauchen auf und fallen sofort in Reih und Glied, stehen Schulter an Schulter wie eine massive Wand aus Ceramit. Ihr Anführer berichtet:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir sind hier, um Unterstützung und Geleit zu bieten!" {n}Er wendet sich zu der Lokomotive um.{/n} "Hey, Infernus-Meister, wir haben {mf|ihn|sie} gefunden!"

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs prévôts émergent à leur tour et se mettent immédiatement en ligne, épaule contre épaule, droits et solides comme un mur de céramite. Leur chef s'approche pour faire son rapport.{/n} « Capitaine Hrotko, Votre Seigneurie. Nous sommes là pour apporter notre aide et vous servir d'escorte ! » {n}Il se tourne vers la locomotive.{/n} « Hé, maître-infernus, on l'a {mf|trouvé|trouvée} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Several enforcers emerge and immediately fall into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs prévôts émergent à leur tour et se mettent immédiatement en ligne, épaule contre épaule, droits et solides comme un mur de céramite. Leur chef s'approche pour faire son rapport.{/n} « Capitaine Hrotko, Votre Seigneurie. Nous sommes là pour apporter notre aide et vous servir d'escorte ! » {n}Il se tourne vers la locomotive.{/n} « Hé, maître-infernus, on l'a {mf|trouvé|trouvée} ! »

languages.text: {n}Gelen birkaç infazcı, derhâl sıraya dizilip seramitten yapılma bir duvar gibi omuz omuza duruyor. Liderleri rapor vermeye başlıyor.{/n} "Komutan Hrotko, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Yardım ve refakat için emrinizdeyiz!" {n}Lokomotife doğru dönüyor.{/n} "İtfa Üstadı, bulduk onu!"
languages.original_text: {n}Several enforcers emerge and immediately fall into line, standing shoulder to shoulder like a solid wall of ceramite. Their leader reports:{/n} "Captain Hrotko, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We are here to provide assistance and escort!" {n}He turns toward the locomotive.{/n} "Hey, Infernus Master, we found {mf|him|her}!"
